# Page Analysis Tab for Rank Math

This plugin is an simply add-on for the [Rank Math](https://rankmath.com/?utm_source=github.com&utm_medium=referral&utm_content=link&utm_campaign=dmhendricks%2Fpage-analysis-tab-rank-math) WordPress plugin. It moves On-Page Analysis from the General tab to its own.

:construction: _This is a work in progress!_

## Requirements

- **This plugin has only been tested with the classic editor, _not the block editor!_**
- WordPress 4.9 or higher
- PHP 7.0 or higher
- [Rank Math](https://wordpress.org/plugins/seo-by-rank-math/) WordPress plugin installed and activated

## Installation

[Download the ZIP](https://github.com/dmhendricks/page-analysis-tab-rank-math/archive/master.zip) file and install as you normally would in WordPress by clicking **Plugins** > **Add New** > **Upload Plugin**.
